item.title: Illegal immigrant murderers could face death penalty under new GOP bill
item.description: Rep. Morgan Luttrell, R-Texas, is leading a bill to make illegal immigrants who commit murder eligible for the death penalty.

item.title: Federal judge blocks Trump admin from dismantling 3 agencies
item.description: Judge John McConnell, an appointee of President Barack Obama, blocked President Donald Trump from closing three federal agencies on Tuesday.

item.title: AOC’s constituents weigh in on presidential run, recall her stunning 2018 political upset

item.title: 'Obey the law': Conservative firebrand torches blue state immigration policies amid major lawsuit

item.title: REAL ID deadline comes and goes – airports report business as usual
item.description: Airport and security officials reported "smooth" operations on Wednesday when passengers were first required to have an updated REAL ID to fly.
